name: Tasty Fried Cauliflower with Sweet and Sour Sauce
author: luke
summary: A tasty side dish and very easy to make when in a hurry for a delicious dish.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon light soy sauce, or to taste
½ head cauliflower, broken into florets
1 (8 ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice
directions: Beat flour, water, and egg together in a bowl to make batter
Stir in soy sauce and salt
Heat oil to a depth of 1/2 inch in a deep-fryer or large saucepan
Dip cauliflower in batter and fry in hot oil until lightly browned, 2 to 3 minutes
Combine pineapple chunks and juice with tomato sauce in a small pot to make sauce; bring to a boil
Mix water and cornstarch in a small bowl until dissolved
Pour into sauce; stir until thickened, 3 to 5 minutes
